verses.verse: This <S%G3588><s%> is a faithful <S%G4103><s%> saying: <S%G3056><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> seeks <S%G3713><s%> the office of an overseer, <S%G1984><s%> he desires <S%G1937><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> work. <S%G2041><s%>

The overseer <S%G1985><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> be <S%G1511><s%> without reproach, <S%G423><s%> the husband <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> temperate, <S%G3524><s%> sensible, <S%G4998><s%> modest, <S%G2887><s%> hospitable, <S%G5382><s%> good at teaching; <S%G1317><s%>

not <S%G3361><s%> a drinker, <S%G3943><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> violent, <S%G4131><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> greedy for money, <S%G146><s%> but <S%G235><s%> gentle, <S%G1933><s%> not quarrelsome, <S%G269><s%> not covetous; <S%G866><s%>

one who rules <S%G4291><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> house <S%G3624><s%> well, <S%G2573><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> children <S%G5043><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> subjection <S%G5292><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> reverence; <S%G4587><s%>

(but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> a man <S%G5100><s%> doesn't <S%G3756><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G1492><s%> to rule <S%G4291><s%> his own <S%G2398><s%> house, <S%G3624><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> will he take care <S%G1959><s%> of the assembly <S%G1577><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>)

not <S%G3361><s%> a new <S%G3504><s%> convert, <S%G3361><s%> lest being puffed <S%G5187><s%> up he fall <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the same condemnation <S%G2917><s%> as the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Moreover <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G846><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> good <S%G2570><s%> testimony <S%G3141><s%> from <S%G575><s%> those who are outside, <S%G1855><s%> to avoid <S%G3361><s%> falling <S%G1706><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> reproach <S%G3680><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the snare <S%G3803><s%> of the devil. <S%G1228><s%>

Servants, <S%G1249><s%> in the same <S%G5615><s%> way, <S%G4586><s%> must be reverent, not <S%G3361><s%> double-tongued, <S%G1351><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> addicted to <S%G4337><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> wine, <S%G3631><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> greedy for money; <S%G146><s%>
holding <S%G2192><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of the faith <S%G4102><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> a pure <S%G2513><s%> conscience. <S%G4893><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Let <S%G1381><s%> them <S%G3778><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be tested; <S%G1381><s%> then <S%G1534><s%> let them serve <S%G1247><s%> if they are <S%G5607><s%> blameless. <S%G410><s%>

Their wives <S%G1135><s%> in the same way <S%G5615><s%> must be reverent, <S%G4586><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> slanderers, <S%G1228><s%> temperate, <S%G3524><s%> faithful <S%G4103><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> all things. <S%G3956><s%>

Let <S%G2077><s%> servants <S%G1249><s%> be <S%G2077><s%> husbands <S%G435><s%> of one <S%G1520><s%> wife, <S%G1135><s%> ruling <S%G4291><s%> their children <S%G5043><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> their own <S%G2398><s%> houses <S%G3624><s%> well. <S%G2573><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> those who have served <S%G1247><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> gain <S%G4046><s%> for themselves <S%G1438><s%> a good <S%G2570><s%> standing, <S%G898><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> great <S%G4183><s%> boldness <S%G3954><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>
These things <S%G5023><s%> I <S%G1125><s%> write to you, <S%G4671><s%> hoping <S%G1679><s%> to come <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> shortly; <S%G5032><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> I wait long, <S%G1019><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> you may know <S%G1492><s%> how <S%G4459><s%> men ought <S%G1163><s%> to behave themselves <S%G390><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the house <S%G3624><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3748><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the assembly <S%G1577><s%> of the living <S%G2198><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> the pillar <S%G4769><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> ground <S%G1477><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Without controversy, <S%G3672><s%> the mystery <S%G3466><s%> of godliness <S%G2150><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> great: <S%G3173><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> was revealed <S%G5319><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> justified <S%G1344><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit, <S%G4151><s%> seen <S%G3700><s%> by angels, <S%G32><s%> preached <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the nations, <S%G1484><s%> believed on <S%G4100><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the world, <S%G2889><s%> and received up <S%G353><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> glory. <S%G1391><s%>
